name: syslogTCPSource
description: Reads syslog data and generate Flume events. The UDP source treats an entire message as a single event. The TCP sources create a new event for each string of characters separated by a newline (‘n’).  Required properties are in bold.

host.name: host
host.description: Host name or IP address to bind to

eventSize.name: eventSize
eventSize.description: Maximum size of a single event line, in bytes

keepFields.name: keepFields
keepFields.description: Setting this to true will preserve the Priority, Timestamp and Hostname in the body of the event.
